channel.title: Java on MyThinkPond
channel.description: Recent content in Java on MyThinkPond

item.title: Understanding Microservices
item.description: tl;dr Understanding how we got here and the problem that it solves will help understand what Microservices is all about. A few months back, I gave a presentation at Leidos Cloud User Group on the topic of “Understanding Microservices”. To my astonishment, we had about 123 folks that attended the presentation. I felt that it’s best that I share this knowledge with the world. I have also created a short (and sweet) implementation of Microservices using JavaScript Cote.

item.title: Spring LDAP Overview | Baeldung
item.description: Learn how to use the Spring LDAP APIs to authenticate and search for users, as well as to create and modify users in the directory server. Source: Spring LDAP Overview | Baeldung

item.title: GreaseMonkey to the rescue - fixing Apache Jackrabbit Site
item.description: Starting yesterday the Apache JackRabbit JCR website had an interesting problem. Someone must have made a change to the base template such that they had removed the SyntaxHighlighter code that needs to be appended to the header. I’ve opened an issue in their jira issue tracker. Contents of JIRA Issue »»»» It started happening today. When I visit the website, for example: http://jackrabbit.apache.org/node-type-notation.html All the artifacts that contain a “SCRIPT” of type syntaxhighlighter does not get displayed.
